text: int main ( void ) { int t , i , n ; long long int s ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t -- ) { s = 0 ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; int a [ n ] ; int b [ n ] ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i ] ) ; } for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { b [ i ] = 0 ; } b [ 0 ] = 1 ; for ( i = 1 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { if ( a [ i ] < a [ i - 1 ] ) { b [ 0 ] = i ; break ; } } for ( i = 1 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { if ( a [ i ] <= a [ i - 1 ] ) b [ i ] = b [ i - 1 ] + 1 ; else b [ i ] = 1 ; } for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) s += b [ i ] ; printf ( "%lld\n" , s ) ; } return 0 ; }
